summary: Contoso Wireless offers internet services with speeds ranging from 10Mbps up to 500Mbps. Fees may apply depending on the plan chosen, and additional services such as virus protection and parental control are available for an extra fee. Contracts are available in both month-to-month and annual options, with new customers eligible for a discounted rate for the first three months of service. A credit check is required prior to activation, and customers may need to purchase or rent equipment in order to get online.
